name: P.I.G PIG
description:
Do you have what it takes to be a P.I.G PIG? Look no further. You will become an expert P.I.G PIG in no time. By playing our P.I.G simulation you will slowly climb the ranks all the way up to P.I.G PIG ! In this state of the art simulation program, made using the latest technology of this year (1982) you will be deployed on planet Porker-Prime, where you will be instructed to collect various items such as : dead astronauts, broken spaceships, satellites, trucks, giraffes, pigs, cows, buses and many more!
How did all these items got on Porker-Prime you ask? Well, You will have to finish the game to find out.
